messages.subject: Fw: Profile of friends OFF TOPIC
messages.msgSnippet: Thought this would be a good way to get to know each other.........Have fun ... From: Michelle Harper To: wlock@clapro.com ; luvthegoats@hotmail.com ;
messages.messageBody:
Thought this would be a good way to get to know each other.........Have fun
----- Original Message -----
From: Michelle Harper
To: wlock@... ; luvthegoats@... ; samathasams@... ; areisa@... ; oceanfrnt3@... ; gardenspath@... ; fairywings8296@...
Sent: Friday, May 26, 2000 10:08 AM
Subject: Profile of friends

Here's what you're supposed to do. Copy (not forward)
this entire e-mail and
paste it onto a new e-mail that you will send. Change
all ofthe answers so
that they apply to you. Then, send this to a whole
bunch of people you know,
INCLUDING the person who sent it to you. The theory is
that you will learn a
lot of little known facts about your friends. Remember
to send yours back to
the person who sent it to you.

FULL NAME: Michelle Lee Szpakowska-Harper
SEX: a woman......
WHAT DO YOU THINK OF OUIJA BOARDS?
Pretty interesting....first introduction to spirit from my Mom
YOUR FAVORITE TV SHOW? None
WHAT'S ON YOUR MOUSE PAD? I don't have one..I use a book...Encyclopedia of Divination
FAVORITE CARD GAME:  Solitaire
FAVORITE MAGAZINE:  None 
BOOK YOU'D RECOMMEND:  Valley of the Horses  Or Healing Wise Or Master book of Herbalism or THe Natural Mind
FAVORITE SMELL:   Sage, Cedar, Lavendar
WORST FEELING IN THE WORLD: Not heard
BEST FEELING IN THE WORLD: Love
FAVORITE SOUNDTRACK: 500 Nations A musical journey or Silver Mandals(neither of which are probably soundtracks, although 500 Nations did have a mini series)
WHAT'S THE FIRST THING YOU THINK OF WHEN YOU AWAKE
IN THE MORNING: Where's the coffee, Check my e-mail, Make Zain Breakfast....Give Loven'.....Where's Dana???  He's always left by then.
DO YOU GET MOTION SICKNESS? No, but I do get sick of the constant motion of city, cars, and people.
ROLLER COASTERS - SCARY OR EXCITING? Both!yah!
PEN OR PENCIL? pen, pencil, crayon, or marker, as long as it writes around here.
HOW MANY RINGS BEFORE YOU ANSWER THE PHONE? 2-3 or not at all
FUTURE SON'S NAME: My son's name is Zain
FUTURE DAUGHTER'S NAME: Don't wanna have a bunch of kids with same name if I ever do have a girl, so I'll hold off on this one..heehee
FAVORITE FOODS: Whole, Organic, Foods preferably Homegrown......You wanted to hear....Spinach Enchiladas..or home-made tacos
CHOCOLATE OR VANILLA? Chocolate
FAVORITE ICE CREAM? Chocolate peanut butter....or Mocha almond fudge
CROUTONS OR BACON BITS? Croutons, and pine nuts
DO YOU LIKE TO DRIVE? Have always enjoyed driving....but not on a backed up freeway
DO YOU SLEEP WITH STUFFED ANIMALS? Dana & Zain may not be stuffed, but they sure are ANIMALS
STORMS - COOL OR SCARY! One of my favorite things,,,,EVER
WHAT TYPE WAS YOUR FIRST CAR?  74 Nova  Green
IF YOU COULD MEET ONE PERSON, DEAD OR ALIVE, WHO WOULD
IT BE?  Zophia Szpakowska....my Grandmother(never met, in person, alive)
FAVORITE ALCOHOLIC DRINK? Just about any kind of creamed liquore
WHAT IS YOUR ZODIAC SIGN? Virgo
DO YOU EAT THE STEMS OF BROCCOLI? Not too many stems, But I do eat the leaves from the garden, and have some stewing right now.
GIRLS, WOULD YOU EVER ASK A GUY FOR HIS SHIRT? Sure, amoung other things..like Will you do the dishes to night, honey? 
IF YOU COULD HAVE ANY JOB YOU WANTED, WHAT WOULD IT BE?
Wildcrafter, Garden Steward, and Herbalist.....who also hosted Sweat lodges....but my present job is the best job I could ever have....Mother, and Wife...Labour of Love
HAVE YOU EVER BEEN IN LOVE? I still am
WHAT IS ON YOUR WALLS IN YOUR ROOM? Posters of : Forest, A Sexy collage of Dana & I in the forest, A bear on ship in the galaxy, a dreamcatcher, above alter...a Map of the moon. Amirror, and pics of Dana& I , Zain, and our friends.
WHAT IS YOUR FAVORITE SNAPPLE? None
ARE YOU A LEFTY, RIGHTY OR AMBIDEXTROUS? All & None...mostly right
FAVORITE MOVIES? Sleepy Hollow  & movies with Nature & respect as themes.
DO YOU TYPE WITH YOUR FINGERS ON THE RIGHT KEYS? I don't know
IF YOU COULD BE ONE GARDENING TOOL, WHAT WOULD YOU BE? My hands....the best gardening tool ever..My heart,...to hear the plant spirits.
WHAT'S UNDER YOUR BED? Carpet, dust bunnies
WHAT IS YOUR FAVORITE NUMBER? 5
WHAT IS YOUR DREAM CAR? My jeep never breaking down
FAVORITE SPORT TO WATCH? None..don't do em'
SAY ONE NICE THING ABOUT THE PERSON WHO SENT THIS TO YOU?Sherry's a beautiful person.
PERSON YOU SENT THIS TO WHO IS LEAST LIKELY TO RESPOND:
Tracy
PERSON MOST LIKELY TO RESPOND: :Lanai, if she knows how to paste, which I just Now learned how to do. 

Michelle
